introduction:
With over 12 years of experience in the embedded systems domain, I specialize in system testing, automation, and data analytics. My career includes a strong foundation in software development, where I have designed and led 
test automation frameworks, validated complex algorithms, and managed data pipelines. I have a deep understanding of 
the software development lifecycle (SDLC), system testing lifecycle (STLC), and am proficient in communication 
protocols. I am passionate about leading teams and mentoring engineers while continuing to develop technical expertise 
across multiple domains, including automotive, transport refrigeration, and telematics.

key_skills.Data Analysis & Visualization: Skilled in data cleaning, analysis, and visualization, ensuring actionable insights are derived from complex datasets.
key_skills.System Testing & Automation: Expertise in both manual and automated system testing for embedded systems, with a focus on quality assurance and process optimization
key_skills.Test Automation Frameworks (Python): Experience in designing and implementing test automation frameworks using  Python to enhance testing efficiency and coverage.
key_skills.Algorithm Validation & Data Pipeline Mai: Validated algorithms for ad systems and maintained data pipelines for real-time data processing.
key_skills.IoT & Data Acquisition Systems: Proficient in working with IoT devices (Raspberry Pi, Arduino) and Data Acquisition Systems (MCC DAQ) for real-time monitoring and data collection.
key_skills.HIL & ECU Testing: Hands-on experience with Hardware-in-the-Loop (HIL) testing and Electronic Control Unit (ECU) testing, ensuring the robustness of embedded systems in automotive applications.
key_skills.Communication Protocols: Knowledge of various communication protocols such as CAN, LIN, Ethernet, and Modbus for system integration.
key_skills.SDLC & STLC: Strong understanding of the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) and Software Testing Life Cycle (STLC), ensuring efficient development and testing processes
key_skills.Test Planning & Documentation: Experienced in creating test plans, DVP&R, and detailed test cases to meet system specifications and requirements.
